subject: Basketball
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The Nets and the Knicks will take their turns, with the 22nd and 24th picks, and they might even find a spare shooter or a backup point guard in the draft bin.
snippet: The Nets and the Knicks will take their turns, with the 22nd and 24th picks, and they might even find a spare shooter or a backup point guard in the draft bin.
